properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 15 at 3:12AM EST until February 16 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 4 to 8 feet, building to 6 to 9
feet expected. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, light
accumulation of freezing spray.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Merrimack River, MA to Stonington,
ME out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to
5 PM EST Sunday. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, until 6 AM
EST early this morning.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST SUNDAY
